website_summaries.verdict: Engineered for both a better fit and improved running form.
pros: Designed with a 9-inch inseam that lends to more comfortable runs where you can focus on your stride, versus your running attire
Performs especially well for those who compete in races with obstacles and need underwear that can stretch
cons: Known for its high waistband, some customers may wish that it fit a bit lower

customer_reviews.title: Best obstacle race gear
customer_reviews.text: I've worn lots of performance underwear, and these are by far the best. I love the snug & durable feel, which keeps everything where it belongs in the middle of a bootcamp or obstacle course race. I wore these for a Spartan Race, and they were really fantastic. I even loved the long inseam, which I was afraid would be too long since my legs are pretty short (I'm 5'5"). They come right to the top of my knees, which is perfect, and they did a great job keeping the mud & grit mostly out during the Spartan Race. These are my new go-to's, and I just ordered another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Baute

customer_reviews.title: GREAT... but...
customer_reviews.text: I've only washed and worn them once. After washing, the printed information on the inside (where it has the size, etc) began peeling off. I first noticed it when I put it on and felt something very scratchy and uncomfortable on my tail-bone area. To remedy, I pulled it all off, which wasn't too difficult. BUT, after that, when I went running, they were awesome!! They kept my stuff perfectly in place for my entire 5-mile run. So, yes get them, but beware the peeling ink.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Buy them u will never look back !
customer_reviews.text: Ok , so I bought theses in July 2018 , I kid u not theses are the best lasting and most comfortable boxers you were everywhere , never get a Wedgy . And they have out last my other Wallmart brands twice ! Get this crap , they still look just as good as the day I bought them crazy .
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dave

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable I've worn in an race!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of good friends who convince me to do really dumb things, like Spartan Races, GoRuck Challenges, and other nonsense. I've worn a couple of different brands of compression shorts, or performance briefs at different times and these are by FAR the most comfortable. They dry quickly, they hold everything in the right place (so I'm not constantly... well... adjusting... that might be TMI, but you get the idea) and have held up well. If they perform like all the other MudGear products I own, then I'm sure I will own these for a long time. Unless I get better friends... then maybe MudGear will make me some performance loungewear or something...
customer_reviews.author: LEC M.

customer_reviews.title: No compression what so ever just underwear
customer_reviews.text: I run OCR events like spartan races, and I was looking for a pair of compression shorts the description said moderate compression. These are boxer shorts they have zero compression. I felt I was mislead by the description. Even some reviews said they would wear them durning spartan races why I do not know. They did not meet expectations. For simply underwear they are great. Kind of loose in the waist maybe I should have sizes down. I messaged their I)G account and they responded quickly and offered a discount on another product so service was quick and helpful. They should describe them as compression shorts cause they are not that!
customer_reviews.author: William Exeter

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shorts to wear while working out and they perform better than I thought. I had purchased other brands which do not fit well and ride up which make them even more uncomfortable. These fit well and do not shift during exercise. I cannot recommend these shorts highly enough and plan to order additional pairs to rotate in my wardrobe during exercise. I plan to wear these running as well and expect them to perform even better than today!. I would give these an A+ which does not surprise me because I have been highly pleased with all MudGear products that I have purchased in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S

customer_reviews.title: Great sport performance/ stitching not so much
customer_reviews.text: Great product and performanc- but the quality of the stitching is concerning. These aren’t every day boxers- but for activity. They fit me great- but they are coming apart at the waist band already.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: TOUGH MUDDER MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: My biggest fear before my first tough mudder was friction between my legs after getting in and out of water and trying to run 10 miles... but I have done 2 Full tough Mudders and have never had an issue. These dry fast... are super comfortable and don't ride up at all. Will never do a Tough Mudder with out them!
customer_reviews.author: PMO

customer_reviews.title: Feel great
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these a handful of times for training (no events yet) but love them so far. This is one of those situations where I didn't think my usual underwear had any issues until I trained in these. They're a little longer than I'm used to (TWSS). But I ended up really liking the length. Other positives: dry quickly, kept everything in place, and feel great. For reference, training was running and ruck and sandbag PT and movements as well. Won't be the last pair I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Loftis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Boxer Briefs for All Types of Athletes
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear UnderArmor briefs but found the MudGear base layer briefs to be more supportive. They are also very breathable. I highly recommend them for any exercising including, running, rucking, boot-camp and ultimate frisbee!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I have Nike's and Academy Sports brand. These wear much better. They just feel well designed. The taller waist band makes a huge difference. I plan to get a few more pairs. Murdock @F3 Highlands
customer_reviews.author: ReagansDad

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Husband has been wearing these for runs, Spartan races and anything active. He loves the, no chafing and comfortable without moving.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Sims

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love these briefs. Fit just right and are made to be very active. I'm pretty sure I can run faster, jump higher, and am just an all around better person when I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: A real ass scratcher
customer_reviews.text: The tag on the rear, which is about 2"x2" and part of the fabric, feels like 10 grit sandpaper after the first wash. If I wear them inside-out they feel fine.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Hiking briefs
customer_reviews.text: Holding up well as my go to hiking briefs. Likely buy more
customer_reviews.author: J D

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: Love the material and the fit! Great job with this one, MudGear!
customer_reviews.author: Carolena

customer_reviews.title: Still comfortable after 13 miles!
customer_reviews.text: Ultra comfortable after a 13 mile hike! Gonna stick to this brand for outdoor and athletic wear
customer_reviews.author: al3j6ndro

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever.
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most comfortable thing I have ever worn. I would consider having a pair for every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F.

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: I like them, the size I ordered was a little small for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Wells

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Great fit. Super breathable. Can’t wait to order again.
customer_reviews.author: troutman

customer_reviews.title: These are a great support brief for the all around athlete
customer_reviews.text: These are a great support brief for the all around athlete. Definitely hold their shape and keep everything in place. Not too long, not too short. Great material!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit but a little loose around the quads if you have skinny legs.
customer_reviews.author: j.c.nav

customer_reviews.title: GREAT COMFORT AND FIT
customer_reviews.text: I have worn another producers products for my outdoor workouts for years. NEVER again. I'm ordering an additional pair today. Great fit with appropriate compression and room where needed.
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality but they shrink a bit in the dryer.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent workmanship...but they shrink a bit in the dryer. I would suggest hang to dry...no issues that way! 😀
customer_reviews.author: Kenpo-Jujitsu Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the fact the underwear do not ride up when I workout!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Compression Shorts
customer_reviews.text: I own a few different brand of compression shorts and recently purchased the MudGear brand. They are by far the most comfortable pair I own. I wore them for a workout, washed them and wore them for the day, they are that comfortable. I highly recommend getting a pair of these if you wear compression shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P McFadden

customer_reviews.title: and the MudGear are by far the best piece of base layer I have
customer_reviews.text: Have used both Nike Pro and Under Armor, and the MudGear are by far the best piece of base layer I have. They are a comfortable fit, and do not feel heavy, should you find yourself in a bit of muddy water, like some other manufacturers products get when wet. Great material that breaths well in the summer months, yet keeps you warm underneath in the dead of winter. Perfect for road races, active training and, of course, any type of obstacle race. I have even worn these chasing friends down some black diamond runs in the mountains.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: They fit great and have held up better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased for USMC mud run and have since worn them for GoRuck and bootcamp workouts. They fit great and have held up better than I expected. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Z

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for a GoRuck event and they worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a GoRuck event and they worked like a charm. This was a long event 24+ hours and my legs did not get chaffed. Will be purchasing another pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew E. Lexow-Gray

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love this base layer briefs! I have worn them in 3 obstacle races with no worries or problems.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. Bought to use for a USMC mud run ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Bought to use for a USMC mud run and continue to wear them to regular boot camp workouts. Get some.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great material, fit, and support you would want for those though workouts!!! Highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gantt

customer_reviews.title: Best workout gear
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Will be my standard base layer going forward. Good fit and solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: Gris

product_meta.title: MudGear Performance Boxer Brief for Men, Breathable Wicking Base Layer Underwear Packed with Tech for Sports and Running
feature_bullets: 9 INCH INSEAM - Built for protection and support, this base layer sports underwear will wick water and prevent chafing during running
STRONG CONSTRUCTION - perfect for obstacle courses like Spartan Race and Tough Mudder, but comfortable for work, travel, and all-day wear
SUPERIOR 4 WAY STRETCH - great mobility for high performance in all sports including football, baseball, basketball and more
ADVANCED WICKING MESH - Crush obstacles with elite level performance design
BUILT FOR SPEED AND COMFORT - elevate your perforamance in your next mud run, trail race, or adventure event
